DOC.brief_summary: The aim evaluate effect early individually tailor web-based multimodal rehabilitation person musculoskeletal neck/shoulder back disorder primary health care . The aim also study early web-based pain rehabilitation program cost-effective multimodal rehabilitation . Randomization do primary health care centre screen 1 ) Multimodal pain rehabilitation web-based education coach support 2 ) multimodal pain rehabilitation . The investigator suggest clear rehabilitation chain web-based program develop , evaluate ready implement show positive effect work-ability and/or cost-effective . The research implementation perform close cooperation Luleå University Technology .
DOC.brief_title: Individually Tailored Web-based Multimodal Pain Rehabilitation Primary Health Care
DOC.criteria: With persistent neuromusculoskeletal pain neck/shoulder/backarea and/or fibromyalgia screen > 90 Lintons´ questionnaire , The Örebro Musculoskeletal Pain Questionnaire ( Linton & Halldén. , 1998 ; Hockings et.al. , 2008 ) Fluent Swedish language Working , disposition least 25 % Exclusion Criteria person : Dementia Restricted cognitive functioning Comorbidity might prevent treatment participation Identified abuse , retirement pension Ongoing causal treatment Pregnancy Patients lack internet attach computer home
